## extend() function

Merge the contents of two or more objects together into the first object.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function extend(...args: unknown[]): Record<string, any> | Array<any>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  args | unknown\[\] |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Record&lt;string, any&gt; \| Array&lt;any&gt;

A copy of the provided object.

## Remarks

Ported from [jQuery](https://github.com/jquery/jquery/blob/7fb90a6beaeffe16699800f73746748f6a5cc2de/src/core.js#L118-L188)<!-- -->.

## Example


```
extend( [deep ], target, object1 [, objectN ] )

```
